system.description: This spell functions like dispel evil, except that you are surrounded by constant, blue, lawful energy, and the spell affects chaotic creatures and spells rather than evil ones. You gain +4 deflection to AC vs. chaotic creatures; you can drive a chaotic creature from another plane back with a touch (Will negates); or with a touch you can dispel one enchantment from a chaotic creature or one chaotic spell.
system.target: You and touched chaotic creature or enchantment
